metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1327 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Apache Struts REST Plugin is using XStream library which is vulnerableand allow perform a DoS attack when using a malicious request withspecially crafted XML payload. Upgrade to the Apache Struts version 2.5.16and switch to an optional Jackson XML handler as described herehttp://struts.apache.org/plugins/rest/#custom-contenttypehandlers. Anotheroption is to implement a custom XML handler based on the Jackson XMLhandler from the Apache Struts 2.5.16.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
